message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that we're both losing money as time passes.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  Let's be fairer to each other. This offer accounts for the fact that we both lose with time, but your loss is less than mine.
Bob, we're both losing out the longer this takes.  My offer is still on the table - it's a good deal that recognizes your losses are greater than mine as time passes. Take it or leave it!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We both lose if this drags on.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.
